metadata.title: CVE-2017-3650 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:C API). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.18 and earlier.Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized readaccess to a subset of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.7(Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
